values.comment: If you're targetting Voidlord (LOOT_368), Possessed Lackey (LOOT_306) or Carnivorous Cube (LOOT_161), gain a huge bonus.
values.condition: my_target(count(), cardid = LOOT_368 | LOOT_306 | LOOT_161, silenced = false) > 0

values.comment: If you're targetting your Hydra, gain a huge bonus.
values.condition: my_target(count(), cardid = UNG_087) > 0 AND opp_minions(count(), cardid = UNG_087) < 1

values.comment: If you're against Warlock, and there is no Voidlord (LOOT_368), Possessed Lackey (LOOT_306) or Carnivorous Cube (LOOT_161) on the board, hold onto this.
values.condition: opp_minions(count(), cardid = LOOT_368 | LOOT_306 | LOOT_161) < 1 AND opp_hero(count(), hero_class = warlock) > 0
